title: Lives
description: Self professed rejects, Max & Cate were always unlucky, both in life and love. Chronicling the lives of Cate Alston and Max Knight, "Lives" follows them from their introduction and meeting through the beginning of their adventure, and all of the ups and downs related to it. The happenstance of their paths crossing marks the beginning of a journey of discovery, and honest soul searching that takes them across the country and deep into each others lives.
author: Gil Gonzalez
